title: ‘Real Housewives of Beverly Hills’ Hosts the Dinner Party From Hell. Plus: ‘Vanderpump Rules,’ ‘The Challenge,’ and ‘Real Housewives of Potomac’ | Reality Top 5
description:
Juliet and Callie react to the new ‘Vanderpump Rules’ trailer that dropped Thursday and talk about a couple other upcoming shows they’re excited about (0:30). Then they talk about the dinner party from hell on ‘Real Housewives of Beverly Hills’ at Kathy Hilton’s house (17:00) and the Shabbat from hell on ‘Real Housewives of New York’ (29:45). Finally, they talk about the implosion of the ‘Big Brother’ alliance on ‘The Challenge’ (35:15) and why Callie isn’t in love with Wendy on this season of ‘Real Housewives of Potomac’ (46:00).
Hosts: Juliet Litman and Callie Curry
Associate Producer: Sasha Ashall
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
